releases.title: RISC-V GNU Tools 2025.08.08 + HTIF + PK
commands: mkdir -p $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/gcc_2025.08.08//riscv32-unknown-elf-ubuntu-20.04-rv32gc_ilp32d && ./build-riscv-tools.sh --compress --force --setup gcc htif pk --docker ubuntu:20.04 --dest $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/gcc_2025.08.08//riscv32-unknown-elf-ubuntu-20.04-rv32gc_ilp32d GNU_REF=2025.08.08 ARCH=rv32gc ABI=ilp32d && mv $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/gcc_2025.08.08//riscv32-unknown-elf-ubuntu-20.04-rv32gc_ilp32d/gnu.tar.xz $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/gcc_2025.08.08//riscv32-unknown-elf-ubuntu-20.04-rv32gc_ilp32d.tar.xz && mv $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/gcc_2025.08.08//riscv32-unknown-elf-ubuntu-20.04-rv32gc_ilp32d/htif.tar.xz $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/gcc_2025.08.08//htif-rv32gc_ilp32d.tar.xz && mv $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/gcc_2025.08.08//riscv32-unknown-elf-ubuntu-20.04-rv32gc_ilp32d/pk.tar.xz $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/gcc_2025.08.08//pk-rv32gc_ilp32d.tar.xz

mkdir -p $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/gcc_2025.08.08//riscv32-unknown-elf-ubuntu-20.04-rv32im_zicsr_zifencei_ilp32 && ./build-riscv-tools.sh --compress --force --setup gcc htif pk --docker ubuntu:20.04 --dest $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/gcc_2025.08.08//riscv32-unknown-elf-ubuntu-20.04-rv32im_zicsr_zifencei_ilp32 GNU_REF=2025.08.08 ARCH=rv32im_zicsr_zifencei ABI=ilp32 && mv $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/gcc_2025.08.08//riscv32-unknown-elf-ubuntu-20.04-rv32im_zicsr_zifencei_ilp32/gnu.tar.xz $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/gcc_2025.08.08//riscv32-unknown-elf-ubuntu-20.04-rv32im_zicsr_zifencei_ilp32.tar.xz && mv $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/gcc_2025.08.08//riscv32-unknown-elf-ubuntu-20.04-rv32im_zicsr_zifencei_ilp32/htif.tar.xz $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/gcc_2025.08.08//htif-rv32im_zicsr_zifencei_ilp32.tar.xz && mv $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/gcc_2025.08.08//riscv32-unknown-elf-ubuntu-20.04-rv32im_zicsr_zifencei_ilp32/pk.tar.xz $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/gcc_2025.08.08//pk-rv32im_zicsr_zifencei_ilp32.tar.xz
